channel.title: Compile error
channel.description:
So I just got this error [code]potions.java:146: cannot find symbol symbol : method randomr() location: class Item c.addItem(Item.randomr(), 1); ^ 1 error Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[/code]
I added this : [code]case 3062: c.deleteItem(3062, c.getItemSlot(3062), 1); c.addItem(Item.randomr(), 1); break;[/code]
I will REP you if you help me with this!

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @xXx_gl0wi_xXx xXx gl0wi xXx
item.description:
@xXx_gl0wi_xXx wrote:

will try, thanks

EDIT: get the same error.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

replace

case 3062: c.deleteItem(3062, c.getItemSlot(3062), 1); c.addItem(Item.randomr(), 1); break;
with

case 3062: c.deleteItem(3062, c.getItemSlot(3062), 1); c.addItem(Item.Random(), 1); break;

Read full topic
